title: MD
biography: Lê Đức Anh was a Vietnamese politician and general who served as the fifth President of Vietnam from 1992 to 1997. He previously led the Vietnamese forces in Cambodia throughout the 1980s. He was regarded as a conservative who advocated maintaining tight party control over domestic policies.
aiSummary: Dang Duc Anh is a epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 81 at National Institute of Hygiene and Epidemiology (Member). Has been published in Poultry Science, The Journal of Poultry Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
education: National Institute of Hygiene and Epidemiology
